name: bissara
ingredients: 450 g of dried fava beans (or split peas/chickpeas)
steps: Soak the fava beans (or peas) overnight in a large volume of water. Drain and set aside.
Peel and cut the carrots and onion into pieces.
Saut√© the onion, fava beans, carrots, and 1 tsp of ground cumin in a pot with olive oil.
Add the vegetable broth and 1L of water. Cover and let simmer for 25 minutes.
Blend the soup until you achieve a smooth texture.
Serve hot, often with a drizzle of olive oil and a pinch of cumin and paprika.
